title: Why is there even greater income inequality amongst black South Africans than white South Africans? Has ANC become a kleptocracy? - Quora

response.answer_text: The first part of the question I am not sure about, I don’t think Stats South Africa would publish something like that, even if it was true. The second part of the question is yes, they have become a kleptocracy. At least Robin Hood stole from the rich to give to the poor. They steal from the rich(income tax) and the poor(VAT/lack of services) to give to themselves (bloated public sector/ corruption/ incompetence).
